verses.verse: For, <S%H113><s%> behold, the Lord, Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> takes away <S%H5493><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and from Judah <S%H3063><s%> supply <S%H4937><s%> and support, <S%H4937><s%> the whole supply <S%H4937><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> supply <S%H4937><s%> of water; <S%H4325><s%>
the mighty man, <S%H1368><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> the judge, <S%H8199><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> the diviner, <S%H7080><s%> the elder, <S%H2205><s%>

the captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty, <S%H2572><s%> the honorable <S%H5375><s%> man, <S%H6440><s%> the counselor, <S%H3289><s%> the skilled <S%H2450><s%> craftsman, <S%H2791><s%> and the clever <S%H995><s%> enchanter. <S%H3908><s%>
I will give <S%H5414><s%> boys <S%H5288><s%> to be their princes, <S%H8269><s%> and children <S%H5288><s%> shall rule over them. <S%H4910><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> will be oppressed, <S%H5065><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> by another, <S%H376><s%> and everyone <S%H376><s%> by his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%> The child <S%H5288><s%> will behave himself proudly <S%H7292><s%> against the old <S%H2205><s%> man, <S%H7034><s%> and the base against the honorable. <S%H3513><s%>

Indeed a man <S%H376><s%> shall take hold <S%H8610><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> saying, <S%H8071><s%> "You have clothing, you be our ruler, <S%H7101><s%> and let this ruin <S%H4384><s%> be under your hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

In that day <S%H3117><s%> he will cry <S%H5375><s%> out, <S%H559><s%> saying, "I will not be a healer; <S%H2280><s%> for in my house <S%H1004><s%> is neither bread <S%H3899><s%> nor clothing. <S%H8071><s%> You shall not make <S%H7760><s%> me ruler <S%H7101><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>"

For Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is ruined, <S%H3782><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> is fallen; <S%H5307><s%> because their tongue <S%H3956><s%> and their doings <S%H4611><s%> are against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to provoke <S%H4784><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of his glory. <S%H3519><s%>

The look <S%H1971><s%> of their faces <S%H6440><s%> testify against them. <S%H6030><s%> They parade <S%H5046><s%> their sin <S%H2403><s%> like Sodom. <S%H5467><s%> They don't <S%H3582><s%> hide it. <S%H188><s%> Woe to their soul! <S%H5315><s%> For they have brought <S%H1580><s%> disaster upon themselves. <S%H7451><s%>
Tell <S%H559><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> "Good! <S%H2896><s%>" For they shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their deeds. <S%H4611><s%>
Woe <S%H188><s%> to the wicked! <S%H7563><s%> Disaster <S%H7451><s%> is upon them; <S%H1576><s%> for the deeds of his hands <S%H3027><s%> will be paid back to him. <S%H6213><s%>

As for my people, <S%H5971><s%> children <S%H5953><s%> are their oppressors, <S%H5065><s%> and women <S%H802><s%> rule <S%H4910><s%> over them. <S%H5971><s%> My people, those who lead <S%H833><s%> you cause you to err, <S%H8582><s%> and destroy <S%H1104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of your paths. <S%H734><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> stands up <S%H5324><s%> to contend, <S%H7378><s%> and stands <S%H5975><s%> to judge <S%H1777><s%> the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will enter <S%H935><s%> into judgment <S%H4941><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his people, <S%H5971><s%> and their leaders: <S%H8269><s%> "It is you who have eaten up <S%H1197><s%> the vineyard. <S%H3754><s%> The spoil <S%H1500><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> is in your houses. <S%H1004><s%>

What do you mean that you crush <S%H1792><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> <S%H1792><s%> and grind <S%H2912><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the poor? <S%H6041><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

Moreover Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> are haughty, <S%H1361><s%> and walk <S%H3212><s%> with outstretched <S%H5186><s%> necks <S%H1627><s%> and flirting <S%H8265><s%> eyes, <S%H5869><s%> walking <S%H1980><s%> to trip <S%H2952><s%> as they go, <S%H3212><s%> jingling <S%H5913><s%> ornaments on their feet; <S%H7272><s%>

therefore the Lord <S%H136><s%> brings sores <S%H5596><s%> on the crown of the head <S%H6936><s%> of the women <S%H1323><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will make their scalps <S%H6596><s%> bald. <S%H6168><s%>"

In that day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> will take away <S%H5493><s%> the beauty <S%H8597><s%> of their anklets, <S%H5914><s%> the headbands, <S%H7636><s%> the crescent necklaces, <S%H7720><s%>
the earrings, <S%H5188><s%> the bracelets, <S%H8285><s%> the veils, <S%H7479><s%>
the headdresses, <S%H6287><s%> the ankle <S%H6807><s%> chains, <S%H7196><s%> the sashes, the perfume bottles, <S%H5315><s%> the charms, <S%H3908><s%>
the signet rings, <S%H2885><s%> the nose <S%H639><s%> rings, <S%H2885><s%>
the fine robes, <S%H4254><s%> the capes, <S%H4595><s%> the cloaks, <S%H4304><s%> the purses, <S%H2754><s%>
the hand mirrors, <S%H1549><s%> the fine linen <S%H5466><s%> garments, <S%H6797><s%> the tiaras, and the shawls. <S%H7289><s%>

It shall happen that instead of sweet spices, <S%H1314><s%> there shall be rottenness; <S%H4716><s%> instead of a belt, <S%H2290><s%> a rope; <S%H5364><s%> instead of well set <S%H4639><s%> hair, <S%H4748><s%> baldness; <S%H7144><s%> instead of a robe, <S%H6614><s%> a wearing <S%H4228><s%> of sackcloth; <S%H8242><s%> and branding <S%H3587><s%> instead of beauty. <S%H3308><s%>
Your men <S%H4962><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and your mighty <S%H1369><s%> in the war. <S%H4421><s%>
Her gates <S%H6607><s%> shall lament <S%H578><s%> and mourn; <S%H56><s%> and she shall be desolate <S%H5352><s%> and sit <S%H3427><s%> on the ground. <S%H776><s%>
